title: Introducing a new way to share!
body:
Resting eagerly underneath your discussion's title awaits a new option: "Share as a link".
Drop your links in the provided field when creating a discussion and we'll spin up an interactive content box for your discussion.

 * Websites? Check.
 * News Articles? Check.
 * Videos? Check.
 * Soundcloud tracks? Check.
 * Images & Galleries? Check and check.

Boards Certified & Draven approved.
